code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import"../components/styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HighlightedXMLDisplay=_ref=>{let{firstComparedOutput,secondComparedOutput}=_ref;const[highlightedFirstXml,setHighlightedFirstXml]=useState('');const[highlightedSecondXml,setHighlightedSecondXml]=useState('');const highlightXml=xml=>{return xml.replace(//g,'>').replace(/<Highlight>([\s\S]*?)<\/Highlight>/g,(match,p1)=>{return`${p1}`;});};useEffect(()=>{setHighlightedFirstXml(highlightXml(firstComparedOutput));},[firstComparedOutput]);useEffect(()=>{setHighlightedSecondXml(highlightXml(secondComparedOutput));},[secondComparedOutput]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"compare-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"compare-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"scroll-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"compare-html",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:highlightedFirstXml}})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"compare-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"scroll-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"compare-html",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:highlightedSecondXml}})})})]});};export default HighlightedXMLDisplay;
